mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into commodity (category_id, name, title, reference_price, activity_price, description, create_by, create_time, put_on_sale_time, put_off_sale_time, is_put_off) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referencePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{activityPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{putOnSaleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{putOffSaleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isPutOff,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update commodity set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reference_price = #{referencePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, activity_price = #{activityPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, put_on_sale_time = #{putOnSaleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, put_off_sale_time = #{putOffSaleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_put_off = #{isPutOff,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select commodity_id, category_id, name, title, reference_price, activity_price, description, create_by, create_time, put_on_sale_time, put_off_sale_time, is_put_off from commodity where commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select commodity_id, category_id, name, title, reference_price, activity_price, description, create_by, create_time, put_on_sale_time, put_off_sale_time, is_put_off from commodity

select commodity_id, category_id, name, title, reference_price, activity_price, description, create_by, create_time, put_on_sale_time, put_off_sale_time, is_put_off from commodity where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
